page.title: 07SEDGEFIELD SPRING/SUM'R TERM
page.content: DURING THE SPRING AND SUMMER TERMS THE CLASSES GO ON SCHOOL TRIPS,WE VISIT PLACES LIKE;RABY CASTLE,BEAMISH HALL,WHITBY,NEWCASTLE. FOR THE SPORTS DAYS WE COMPETE AGAINST OTHER SCHOOLS.IN 1985 WE COMPETED AGAINST BISHOPTON-REDMARSHAL AND NORTON GLEBE.WE HAVE OUR OWN SCHOOL SPORTS DAY TOO.THE RACES WE RUN ARE SPRINTS,SKIPPING, SACK,RELAY,200 METRES,3 LEGGED RACE, EGG AND SPOON,OBSTACLE AND CRAB RACE. SOMETIMES AT THE END OF ALL THE SPORTS DAY THERE IS USUALLY A TODDLERS AND MOTHERS RACE. FOR THE END OF TERM THE TOP CLASS PERFORM A SUMMER PLAY.THE ONE FOR 1985 WAS CALLED "BRER RABBIT."
